keyMoments.title: Thousand Sunny's Secret Weapons Unveiled
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates reveal the Thousand Sunny's secret weapons - the Kurosai FR-U IV and Brachio Tank V - in battle against the New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's preparation and enhanced capabilities after the two-year timeskip.

keyMoments.title: Post-Timeskip Strength Demonstration
keyMoments.description: The entire crew showcases their enhanced abilities and new techniques, overwhelming the New Fish-Man Pirates' forces.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Straw Hats' readiness for the New World challenges.

jollyRoger: Skull wearing a straw hat with crossbones

keyMoments.title: Surume Deployed as Trump Card
keyMoments.description: Hody Jones deploys Surume the kraken as his trump card against the Straw Hats, attempting to use overwhelming force.
keyMoments.significance: Represents Hody's strategy of using coercion and force to control powerful allies.

keyMoments.title: Loss of Surume
keyMoments.description: The New Fish-Man Pirates lose control of Surume when the kraken chooses to obey Luffy instead of Hody.
keyMoments.significance: Major tactical defeat showing the weakness of Hody's coercive methods.
